text: It is enough for a disciple that he become like his teacher, and a slave like his master.This should be our goal: be like Jesus, do like Jesus. Since they have stigmatizedI here follow the best line of transmission, with 30% of the Greek manuscripts. ‘To stigmatize’ is the appropriate verb here, rather than ‘to call’. the master of the house as Beelzebul,All Greek manuscripts have ‘Beelzebul’, rather than the familiar ‘Beelzebub’, that is a carryover from the Latin. how much more those of his household!
